CreateMeeting.Title: New Meeting
DeleteMeeting.Title: Delete
DeleteMeeting.ShortHelp: Deletes the meeting from the database.
DeleteMeeting.LongHelp: You can delete a meeting only if it is in the Draft maturity state.
FilterMeeting.Title: Filter By
ViewMeeting.Title: Switch View
ViewMeeting.ShortHelp: Shows the meetings in the format you select.
ViewMeeting.LongHelp: The Tile view shows all meetings in separate tiles. The Table view shows all meetings in a tabular format.
CreateAgenda.Title: New Agenda Item
CreateAgenda.ShortHelp: Creates an agenda item for the meeting.
CreateAgenda.LongHelp: The total duration of all the agenda topics must not exceed the meeting duration.
SaveAgenda.Title: Save Agenda Edits
SaveAgenda.ShortHelp: Saves the updated sequence of the agenda items.
ResetAgenda.Title: Reset Agenda Edits
ResetAgenda.ShortHelp: Resets the sequence of agenda items to their last saved sequence.
DeleteAgenda.Title: Delete
DeleteAgenda.ShortHelp: Deletes the agenda items from the database.
DeleteAgenda.LongHelp: Upon deletion of an agenda item: The decision auto-created for the agenda item remains unaffected. The speaker of the agenda item is retained as attendee of the meeting unless removed manually.
AddAttendee.Title: Add Attendees
AddAttendee.ShortHelp: Adds users or user groups as attendees to the meeting.
AddAttendee.LongHelp: You can add attendees to a meeting only if it is in the In Work maturity state or earlier.
SaveAttendance.Title: Save Attendance
SaveAttendance.ShortHelp: Saves the updated record of attendance.
ResetAttendance.Title: Reset Attendance
ResetAttendance.ShortHelp: Resets the attendance to its last saved record.
DeleteAttendee.Title: Remove
DeleteAttendee.ShortHelp: Removes the users or user groups from to the meeting.
DeleteAttendee.LongHelp: You can remove attendees from a meeting only if it is in the In Work maturity state or earlier.
ViewAttendees.Title: Switch View
ViewAttendees.ShortHelp: Shows attendees of the meeting in the format you select.
ViewAttendees.LongHelp: The Tile view shows all atendees in separate tiles. The Table view shows all attendees in a tabular format.
CreateDecision.Title: New Decision
NewDecision.Title: New Decision
NewDecision.ShortHelp: Creates a decision for the meeting.
RemoveDecision.Title: Remove
RemoveDecision.ShortHelp: Removes the decision from the opened meeting.
RemoveDecision.LongHelp: After removal from the meetings, the decisions are retained as the stand-alone decisions.
DeleteDecision.Title: Delete
DeleteDecision.ShortHelp: Deletes the decision from the database.
FilterDecision.Title: Filter By
FilterDecision.LongHelp: Filter the list decisions using any other category in combination with the Owned by Me or My Actions category.
ViewDecision.Title: Switch View
ViewDecision.ShortHelp: Shows decisions of the meeting in the format you select.
ViewDecision.LongHelp: The Tile view shows all decisions in separate tiles. The Table view shows all decisions in a tabular format.
AddAppliesTo.Title: Add Applies To
AddAppliesTo.ShortHelp: Adds an object that the decision applies to.
AddAppliesTo.LongHelp: You can add objects to a decision only if it is in the To Do maturity state.
DeleteAppliesTo.Title: Remove
DeleteAppliesTo.ShortHelp: Removes the objects that the decision applies to.
ViewAppliesTo.Title: Switch View
ViewAppliesTo.ShortHelp: Shows the Applies To objects in the format you select.
ViewAppliesTo.LongHelp: The Tile view shows all objects in separate tiles. The Table view shows all objects in a tabular format.
OpenContextualMenu.Title: Open
RelationsContextualMenu.Title: Relations
RelationsContextualMenu.ShortHelp: Opens the selected object in the Relations app which displays the objects related to it.
DeleteContextualMenu.Title: Delete
DeleteContextualMenu.ShortHelp: Deletes the selected object from the database.
